This is the Rugginenti recording of selections from Eugenio Montale's poetry read by
Sergio Scorzillo and Daniela La Pira, to which is added an ABC
feature on Montale. To follow (eventually) will be the 1976 Mondadori
recording and the Antologia Sonora CD with Vittorio Gassman.
